title: Beautiful teen girl home on college break found naked, raped and murdered after jogging with her dog. What happened to Mandy Stavik?
itunes:title: Beautiful teen girl home on college break found naked, raped and murdered after jogging with her dog. What happened to Mandy Stavik?
description:
Mandy Stavik takes off on an afternoon jog with her German Sheppard. The dog comes home. Mandy does not.

With Nancy Grace today to discover the details of this case:

  • Ashley Wilcott, Judge and trial attorney
  • Steven Lampley, former detective
  • George Schiro , DNA expert
  • Dr. Katherine Maloney, Medical Examiner
  • Dr. Carla Manly, Psychologist
  • Joanna Small, reporter KIRO 7

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
